segments.text: Good morning . Can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good morning . I ’ m here to see Rochelle Davis , the Human Resources Manager .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you have an appointment with her ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I do . I have a 10:00 appointment with her this morning .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Okay . What ’ s your name , please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thanks . Please sit down . She ’ ll be with you shortly .
segments.speaker: S1
